Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2012 04:36PM worriedmummy wrote: Hi hun, Thanks for your quick reply. I am not breastfeeding at all now. I did up until my son was a year old but this has only recently developed in the last couple of months. That's why i can't understand why the doctor would say it's a breast infection and breast infections are mainly mastitus right? I am 10 weeks pregnant also but i feel it wouldn't be related to that as this started before i was pregnant too. I would highly doubt it is an allergic reaction to anything as it is only this breast i have this on and i haven't used any new things i haven't used before. Very worried though and hard to concentrate on anything else when your breast is distracting you so much. I put the pic up to give everyone who gives advice a clearer picture of what was going on with me, sometimes it's hard to explain and word things properly via text. xxx
